text: Hasan Celal Güzel (1945, Gaziantep – 19 March 2018) was a Turkish journalist and politician. He was Minister of Education, Youth and Sport (1987 - 1989). He was leader of the Rebirth Party in the 1990s, a party he co-founded in 1992. He has been a columnist for Radikal and Vatan. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Turkish writers Category:Turkish politicians Category:Turkish journalists
title: Hasan Celal Güzel
